Original:

紅字-偏甜；綠字-偏酸；黑字-酒感較厚

綜合炸物拼盤

BBQ披薩
臘腸披薩
銀絲卷

有空可以來走訪～

In the alley near Guting Station
The renovation of nostalgia and old house, with the first and second floors
About 40 people can accommodate about 40 people
The overall is nostalgic decoration, comfortable and relaxed atmosphere
The wine insurance is very interesting, come back and chat

Broken wine list
It's fun, you can touch it blindly ~
The color is divided into flavor

But feel the wine is not light after drinking 酒

It's a cooked food:

At the beginning, the wine list was to see the special mahjong, so if you do n’t know what you want to order to use the card to be randomly, it is very special. The boss will help you be customized. The clerk's interaction with the customer is hot and comfortable. The customers will chat with each other. The atmosphere is driven by George. A rare place for drinking, plus the location of the No. 7 exit at Guting MRT Station is less than one minute, is a good place for classmates and friends to meet and chat!

Original:
復古老宅風的「小巷裁縫」，有露天的室外座位以及兩層樓的室內座位，室內空間不管是一樓或是二樓，都瀰漫著淡淡一股煙味，空氣不太清新，不是很喜歡！每人低消為$350、無收取服務費。當天的餐點不怎麼滿意(以下說明)，調酒喝起來也頗甜的。

🔸️ 總裁炸物拼盤 $500
可以任選菜單上的四種炸物，我們點了雞米花、炸牡蠣、酥炸魚塊、香濃起司條，加上固定班底-脆薯佐松露醬。炸物上桌時，點的四款炸物溫度都是溫溫地@@，如果是現炸的，基本上應該要熱呼呼的吧！除此之外，麵衣外皮也不夠酥香。

🔸️ 巷口手工水餃 (高麗菜/韭菜) 10顆 $150
從點餐到水餃上桌，等了約莫一個半小時！真的等很久…，中間有詢問過店家，店家說還再煮！好不容易水餃上桌，一吃居然是高麗菜口味，可是我們點的是韭菜水餃ㄟ！再次詢問店家，原來是廠商包裝外印韭菜口味，沒想到裡面是高麗菜水餃XD！店家有說要再給我們一杯調酒作為補償，我們有婉拒了！但內心還是會小不開心，我們沒有想要吃高麗菜水餃啊啊啊！

付款方式：現金/街口支付
EN:
The "alley tailor" of the retro old house has open -air outdoor seats and two -story indoor seats. Whether the indoor space is the first or second floor, there is a touch of smoke. I like it very much!Each person is low at $ 350, and no service fee is charged.The meals on the day were not very satisfied (hereinafter explained), and the bartending was also very sweet.

️ President exploding platter $ 500
You can choose the four kinds of fried objects on the menu. We ordered chicken rice, fried oysters, crispy fried fish pieces, fragrant ripples, plus fixed team-crispy potato Sato sauce.When the fried object is on the table, the temperature of the four fried objects ordered is warmly @@. If it is fried, basically it should be hot!In addition, the outer skin of the noodles is not crispy enough.

水️ Handmade dumplings (Korean vegetables/leek) 10 $ $ 150
From ordering to dumplings, I waited for about an hour and a half!I really waited for a long time ..., I asked the store in the middle, and the store said that it was cooked again!After all, the dumplings were on the table, and when I ate it, it was actually the taste of cabbage, but we ordered leek dumplings!Ask the store again, it turned out that the manufacturer's packaging was printed with leeks. I did not expect it to be the Gauntana dumplings XD!The store said that we want to give us a cup of bartender as compensation, we have declined!But there will still be a small and unhappy in our hearts. We don't want to eat Korean vegetable dumplings!

Payment method: cash/street payment

Original:
在羅斯福路的巷弄裡。輕鬆的氣氛、年輕的面孔，豐富的酒單和菜單。上下兩層樓，各式老派沙發有種低調優雅、內斂華麗。
點了台式鹽酥雞和檸檬烤雞翅，有85分水準👍調酒表現更優，原來威士忌加了苦艾酒和煙燻蘋果木如此搭調～掀蓋白煙緩緩湧動飄散，視覺已浪漫😍酒杯才一靠近，立馬嗅到個性十足的煙燻風味，嗅覺超驚豔😲一入口，味覺欣然被收服。
EN:
In the alley on Rooseford Road.A relaxed atmosphere, young faces, rich wines and menus.There are two floors on the upper and lower floors, and all kinds of old sofas have low -key elegance, restrained and gorgeous.
I ordered desktop salt crispy chicken and lemon grilled chicken wings. There are 85 points. The bartending performance is better. It turns out that the whiskey adds bitter Ai wine and smoky apple wood so much ~ The lift white smoke slowly fluttered, the vision has already been, the vision has already been, As soon as the romantic wine glass was approaching, I immediately smelled the smoky flavor of personality, and the sense of smell was super stunning.

Original:
台北的秘密酒吧？我幾乎每天都會經過這個地方，但我從來不知道這是酒吧，直到我的朋友告訴我哈哈。

在這裡您可以品嚐各種雞尾酒。如果你不知道該喝什麼，你可以告訴他們你的口味，他們會推薦適合你的雞尾酒。

他們提供一些小吃，您可以與朋友一起享用，如果天氣好，您還可以享受戶外空間。我一定會回來的！
EN:
The secret bar in Taipei?I pass this place almost every day, but I never know that this is a bar, until my friend tells me haha.

Here you can taste all kinds of cocktails.If you don't know what to drink, you can tell them your taste, they will recommend cocktails that suits you.

They provide some snacks and you can enjoy it with friends. If the weather is good, you can also enjoy outdoor space.I will definitely come back!

Original: 這是一個遠離繁忙街道的非常安靜的地方。裡面有一點食物，而且雞腿真的很飽！飲料很棒，而且買 4 瓶啤酒送 1 瓶還有優惠。我唯一的抱怨是1.我認為酒吧區應該清理出來僅供顧客使用，因為我有時也會去酒吧，所以我喜歡坐在酒吧區與調酒師閒聊。但我想大多數人都會和其他朋友一起去那裡。 2.樓上的浴室不是很溫馨。除此之外，這是朋友或同事閒逛的好地方。
EN: This is a very quiet place away from the busy street.There is a little food in it, and the chicken legs are really full!The drink is great, and buy 4 bottles of beer to get 1 bottle and there are discounts.My only complaint is 1. I think the bar area should be cleaned only for customers, because I sometimes go to the bar, so I like to sit in the bar area to chat with the bartender.But I think most people will go there with other friends.2. The bathroom upstairs is not very warm.In addition, this is a good place for friends or colleagues.

Original:
這家酒吧因其位置和設施而具有如此潛力，但業主似乎並沒有真正認真地將其打造為優質場所。  食物不斷變質，員工不斷更換。  我不會再像以前那樣推薦它。
（舊評論）位於城市中心的一個小綠色公園旁的戶外座位！  在台北很少見。  室內也可愛又溫暖。  維克多提供優質的服務和雞尾酒。  菜色也不錯。  我們一定會回來的。
EN:
This bar has such potential because of its location and facilities, but the owner does not seem to really seriously build it as a high -quality place.Food is constantly deteriorating, and employees are constantly replaced.I won't recommend it as before.
(Old comment) Outdoor seat next to a small green park in the center of the city!It is rare in Taipei.The room is also cute and warm.Victor provides high -quality services and cocktails.The dishes are also good.We will definitely come back.
